revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: [- - -];[Year 2(?), Pharmouthi] 5 on account of Pachon. [- - -, son of (- - -, grandson of)] Satabous has paid through Apolinarius[- - -] for garden land of the 1st(?) year 750 copper drachmai, for the transport of olives 105 (copper drachmai), for naubion 75 (copper drachmai), [for additional charges 190 (copper drachmai), for acreage 500 (copper drachmai)], for additional charges 40 (copper drachmai), for exchange 10 (copper drachmai), for the receipt 1 obol, for the naubion tax on the katoikoi [50 (copper drachmai), for additional charges 5 (copper drachmai), for exchange] 1 (copper drachma), for the receipt 1 obol, [for the geometria of the 2nd(?) year 15 (copper drachmai), for additional charges] 5 1/2 obols, for the receipt 1 obol.

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, ZPE 109, 94-95, 1995, Pl. XIII -- SB XXII, 15854
